steps.section: DNA Extraction: Zymo Research Quick-DNA Fecal/Soil Microbe Midiprep Kit (Cat #: D6110)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8s9as","text":"Add   of soil sample to the bead/filter of a ZR Bashing Bead Lysis/Filtration Tube (50 mL w/ 0.5 mm Beads; Cat #: S6010).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":1},{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":75}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2m5ie","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"36e4t","text":"Place tubes in a bead beater (Bullet Blender) and process the samples for 10 minutes at speed 8.
